fatwas.items.title: Surah An-Nisa (4:11)
fatwas.items.text: Allah commands you concerning your children: for the male, what is equal to the share of two females...

fatwas.items.title: Surah An-Nisa (4:12)
fatwas.items.text: And for the wives is one fourth if you leave no child. But if you leave a child, then for them is one eighth...

fatwas.items.title: Sahih Bukhari
fatwas.items.text: Give the Faraid (shares of inheritance) to those entitled. Whatever remains goes to the closest male relative.

fatwas.items.title: Sahih Muslim
fatwas.items.text: Learn the laws of inheritance and teach them to the people, for they are one-half of knowledge.

fatwas.items.title: Imam Abu Hanifa
fatwas.items.text: Inheritance shares should be calculated with utmost precision according to the Quran and Sunnah.

fatwas.items.title: Imam Malik
fatwas.items.text: The faraid laws protect family rights and maintain social justice.

fatwas.items.title: Imam Shafi'i
fatwas.items.text: Inheritance is a divine right fixed by Allah and must be respected without alteration.

fatwas.items.title: Imam Ahmad ibn Hanbal
fatwas.items.text: Proper inheritance distribution ensures harmony and prevents disputes among heirs.
